entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023
